title: Is He Hunting Deer Or Something Else
itunes:title: Is He Hunting Deer Or Something Else
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I married my high school sweetheart and we have one child together. He had joined the Coastguard and I chose to put aside my career plans in order to follow him around wherever he is stationed, because I was very much in love with this man. We are now in a very small town and I find myself lost and lonely..................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
